headline: Wells Fargo Stays Bullish on Apple (AAPL) Amid $100B U.S. Expansion Plan
summary: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is one of the Hot AI Stocks on Wall Street’s Radar. On August 7, Wells Fargo analyst Aaron Rakers reiterated an Overweight rating on the stock with a $245.00 price target. The rating affirmation follows Apple’s recent announcement that it is increasing its investment in the United States by $100B to $600B over […]
